page.title: 05LAINDON SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: The{Laindon shopping centre}is quite convenient for most people. I know because from my house it is only a ten minute walk and a five minute drive . The only disadvantage is that on Saturday the car parks get over full and you have to park by the garages or up Worthing Road . Laindon has two chemists which are quite good there is not usually a big queue. There are about two super markets (International is the biggest) and the other is Shoppers Paradise. There has just been a new indoor market opened. I bought a pound of grapes at sixty one pence per pound and only got charged fifty pence.
